name: NEW! Bobby Joe Ebola "Trainwreck To Narnia" CD (2012, 12 Songs)
description:
It's here! The long-awaited follow up to our comeback record, 2010's "F"... TRAINWRECK TO NARNIA! 12 songs of epic awesome that you'll love so much you likely just have to order 2 copies right now... cos you'll play the first one so much, it'll become dust!

Featuring the hits, "Bone Dagger" and "Blues Turn Brown" and more! 

TRACK LISTING:

1.  After the Armadillo
2.  Vanilla American
3.  Blues Turn Brown
4.  Biological Imperative
5.  My Darling Boo
7.  Baked Beans & Whiskey
8.  Walk in the Crosswalk
9.  Bone Dagger
10. Censor The Word
11. Hey Everybody
12. The Last Child Soldier 

Check out this review of the album by Comedy-Reviews.Com!

"... The songs here are relatively short, rarely clocking in at over three minutes. They’ve cut out everything that doesn’t drive the music or the humor (or both) and get right down to business. There are no filler refrains or needless repetitions just to make the song the standard three and half minutes in length. They go in, get the job done, and then get the hell out. Like a SWAT team of musicians, they remain focused and do what they need to do. 

And man, they do it well. 

Their style of music here varies from pub song sing-alongs (the enjoyable “Baked Beans & Whiskey” that is about exactly what the title says), rock ("Walk in the Crosswalk" urges safety first, especially since medical bills can be expensive), a nod to the roaring 20s (“My Darling Boo” is probably the best song you’ve ever heard about a mannequin), and head-banging metal that immediately put me in mind of the one and only time I played Dungeons & Dragons. I was in junior high school and, had “Bone Dagger” been out then, it’s definitely what I would have been singing in my head. One moment declaring the ominous power I would yield (“I will slay the fucking dragon!”) and the next admitting there are repercussions to my actions (“I will make a big ass mess!”). Somewhere Tenacious D and Brian Posehn are fist pumping along with the music.

At times, especially on “Vanilla American,” a tune that mixes great harmonies with fun tempo changes, BJE reminded me of Barenaked Ladies and They Might Be Giants. That’s not a bad thing, I’m a fan of both, but they all share a similar whimsical feel that makes it easy to listen to each track on the CD without skipping tracks. On the opening song, “After the Armadillo,” BJE says it all when they promise “Tonight is many things but boring ain’t one of ‘em.”

What’s especially fun is when the lyrics of the song are in direct opposition with the musicality. Where else will you find a grinding almost-screamo tune urging us to remove a particularly offensive word from our vernacular? And “Cop Kisser,” a love song to the boys in blue, is arranged and performed in a style that would make you assume the inverse.

It’s difficult to choose a favorite track because this CD is so solid, but if I had to I would choose “Blues Turn Brown,” the lament of a 34-year-old college educated guy down on his luck and willing to do anything to keep his internet on (“When the dog shit is piled high/ it blocks out the sky/ until your blues turn brown”). Because if you’re going to sing the blues, you might as well make other people smile in the process. Bobby Joe Ebola and the Children MacNuggits does just that."

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "F" Vinyl LP w/ digital download, poster and more! (2010, 13 Tracks)
description: The first new album in 10 years from BOBBY JOE EBOLA AND THE CHILDREN MACNUGGITS, “F” is a searing look at how the world grinds us down… and how sometimes, we can fight the “F” back. 13 tracks meld rock, punk, psychedelia, and folk with the vicious, satirical wit that made them underground legends. Featuring guest spots by buddies from Fleshies, Your Mother, Blatz, M.K.O.T.C., Bay Area Derailleurs, and comedian Alex Koll! Vinyl LP contains an awesome pull-out poster, a digital download code for MP3 versions of the record and other cool items! (CD CURRENTLY OUT OF STOCK)

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Carmelita Sings!: Visions of a Rock Apocalypse" Deluxe Reissue CD (2011, 32 songs)
description: Digitally remastered and expanded edition of this 2000 album from the Punk band formed by guitarist Dan Abbott and singer Corbett Redford. Carmelita Sings: Visions Of A Rock Apocalypse, the dark and cerebral classic, is reissued for the first time with its original 40 page art-book. In addition to the full-length, this brick of awesome features B-sides, an unreleased MacNuggit radio performance from 1999, and includes reprinted stickers & buttons from the tense and bygone era of the original release. 32 songs on the CD, plus a download code for another full-length worth of epic Bobby Joe Ebola gems.

name: NEW! Bobby Joe Ebola "Bird Snake" T-Shirt
description:
This BRAND NEW t-shirt design comes from local Oakland artist Jon Carling (http://joncarling.com) and features a part-bird, part-snake "Ouroboros Chimera" and the band's initials- BJE.

Available in all sizes! S, M, L, XL and NEW Ladies' Small and Ladies Medium!

One color ink (BLACK) on WHITE soft Gildan shirt

name: NEW! LIMITED EDITION! Bobby Joe Ebola "X-Ray Cat" T-Shirt
description:
These are the remaining exclusive shirt designs from our most recent fundraising campaign! Once they are gone, they are gone!

Featuring a amazingly detailed & beautiful illustration by Oakland artist Ben Catmull (Fantagraphics' Ghosts and Ruins, Monster Parade), these shirts are printed with white ink on a high quality soft black Canvas brand 100% cotton shirt.

NOTE: The higher than usual price is in an effort to keep the shirts at the same price they were offered to people during the campaign, also in an effort to cultivate some much needed funds for the band!

name: NEW! Bobby Joe Ebola "8-Bit Power Up!" 5" x 5" Vinyl Sticker
description:
Whoa! This is cool! This sticker is an extra large 5" x 5" quality vinyl weatherproof sticker designed by comedian and all around awesome guy, Alex Koll! 

It features Corbett & Dan as angry 8-bit video game characters! Totally cool!

name: NEW! Bobby Joe Ebola Large Bottle Opener Keychain!
description: This black and white bottle opener keychain is sturdy, not like the small plastic ones that break! It has a solid aluminum core, is three inches long and has artist Jon Carling's iconic Bobby Joe Ebola logo printed on it! Get yours today and start crackin' them bottles!

name: NEW! LIMITED EDITION! Bobby Joe Ebola "Sick Jagger" Silkscreened 11" x 17" Poster
description:
Only 25 of these were made by Forthrite Printing in Oakland, CA for our recent fundraising campaign - and we are offering the extra prints here! Each four color silkscreened print is numbered 1 thru 25 and was illustrated by frequent Bobby Joe Ebola collaborator Jason Chandler of Horrible Comics!

Get yours now! Once they are gone, they won't be printed again!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Bone Dagger" 18" x 24" GIANT Poster!
description:
This EPIC poster illustrated by the great Aussie Mike Foxall (http://xraystudios.com) features the Keeper of the Bone Dagger holding the storied cursed object aloft while standing atop a mountain of skulls! BADASS!!

Poster measures 18" x 24" and is perfect for framing or nailing to the wall of your mom's garage.

name: Bobby Joe Ebola/Your Mother "Advice For Young Lovers" Split Vinyl 7"
description:
Recently found in new condition in a random garage in San Francisco, (no joke!) these are the last of the stock of these albums from the original 1998 pressing on S.P.A.M. Records. On black vinyl, it also contains a poster of a cowboy in his underwear! You're excited!

Featuring two tracks from legendary Bay Area fun punk band, Your Mother (Jealousy=Bad, The Ballad of Butthead Jeff) and two tracks from Bobby Joe Ebola (Bungee Birth & Cry For The Camera (With Rock Sauce)), this pile is the last of these that will ever be pressed!

Hotcakes! Hotcakes!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Sick Jagger" T'Shirt!
description:
It's back! Jason Chandler of Horrible Comics/Frustrators fame designed this awesomeness! It now comes on a charcoal grey shirt and will get people giving it a second look. How chic! Vomit!

Available in XL ONLY! Restocking all other sizes soon! 

Three color ink design (GREEN, RED AND WHITE) on CHARCOAL Gildan shirt

name: NEW! Bobby Joe Ebola "Nuclear Cockroach" T-Shirt
description:
Wowie zowie, look at this awesome BRAND NEW design! Yet again from the dazzling pen of illustrator Jason Chandler of Horrible Comics, this cataclysmic scenario features a terribly happy cockroach doing a jig of joy as the world succumbs to nuclear war. 

Pretty much sums up the general theme of our band more than any other design we've been honored to feature. 

SMALL SIZE ONLY! We will be restocking M, L, XL and XXL soon!

Two color ink (YELLOW AND RED) on a BLACK Gildan shirt!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Not A Real Band" Ceramic Coffee Mug
description:
If you're like us, you live on coffee. It is a necessary component to life, in our humble opinion. 

Ever consider killing yourself slowly with caffeine with our band right by your side the whole time?! Well, we've got you covered!

This new ceramic coffee mug features Jason Chandler of Horrible Comics' 'cartoon logo' design for our band! Pretty freakin' sweet!

Coffee not included! But, who knows... maybe we'll start selling MacNuggit coffee soon! Free trade and Ebola free!

name: Assorted Bobby Joe Ebola Vinyl Stickers
description:
Indoor, outdoor, forehead... these durable vinyl stickers will last for years unless your ADD ass picks them off in a nervous stupor.

Many shapes and sizes to choose from! All only a buck!

If you want more than one design, add one to your cart, then come back to this page, change the style and add another!

Clockwise from left corner, your choices are:

#1 - "Cartoon Dan & Corbett" Large Square Sticker
#2 - "Cat Rumble" Large Rectangle Sticker
#3 - "Freaky Baby" Medium Rectangle Sticker
#4 - "Life Is Excellent" Long Rectangle Sticker
#5 - "Red and Black Logo" Small Rectangle Sticker

options.name: "Red and Black Logo" Small Rectangle Sticker

name: NEW! Bobby Joe Ebola "Cartoon Logo" T-Shirt
description:
A bright variation on Jason C.'s iconic logo for our band!

Available in S, M, L & XL

One color ink (WHITE) on RED Gildan

name: NEW! Bobby Joe Ebola "Cockroach" 3" x 4" Vinyl Sticker
description:
The brand new and amazing design from Jason Chandler from Horrible Comics! Black ink on white weatherproof vinyl!

Sticker measure 3" x 4" - perfect for your car, locker or forehead!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Life Is Excellent" Bumper Sticker
description:
Show the world what's up with this snazzy bumper sticker. Life is worth living, even if the world is dying... or at least our awesome band says so!

It the mortal words of MJ, "Make that fuckin' change."

Sticker is strong outdoor vinyl. Two color (red & black) silk screened.

12" long by 4" wide.

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Felt Badges" 1" Buttons
description:
Lovingly crafted by Corbett of Bobby Joe Ebola's wonderful wife, Melissa, these are our 1" buttons... with a classy twist!

Cut with a few different kinds of felt that match the buttons primary colors, they are a beautiful addition to any hip jacket, hat, handbag or man-purse!

Available in 6 different styles! Choose a few! They're awesome!

options.name: Not A Real Band Ebola Logo Felt

name: Bobby Joe Ebola 11x17 Art Poster By Theron Brown
description: From the beautiful brain of artist Theron Brown (http://sevencities.net), comes this stylized rendition of Melissa Avignon-Redford's photo of the band! This 11x17 poster is perfect for framing or for putting on the back of your bathroom door, so when you are sitting on the toilet, you can have our band stare at you! Cool!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Animals Of Bobby Joe Ebola" Button Set
description:
NOTE: SHIPS MARCH 15TH 2012! 

The 'Animals of Bobby Joe Ebola' Button Set is based on the many finned, feathered and furry characters found in the songs of the band, Bobby Joe Ebola and the Children MacNuggits. 

'The Dog Ate The Baby', 'Hermie Halbert, the Abrasive Tourette's Fish', 'The Skin Cancer Cockroaches', 'Mr. Turtle', 'Bobby the Squirrel' and 'Canary' buttons were illustrated by Christopher Murdoch (hambrawl.com). 'Strangely Patriotic Corbett & Dan' button was illustrated by Don Reniff (drunkduck.com/Bastard_Comics). All buttons colored by Shawn Martin.

$2 from every button set sold will be donated directly to the Berkeley East Bay Humane Society to help them recover from the tragic fire they experienced in May 2010.

name: Assorted Bobby Joe Ebola Specialty Buttons
description:
Each of these buttons are kinda odd-ball! 

The "Ladybugs Humping" and "Fingerfuck" buttons are large 2" "political rally" size badges! 

The triangle shaped, "Kick A Capitalist" "road sign button is a favorite that says "Danger, Mr. CEO. Come to my zone and I'll kick you in the balls so hard, you'll vomit." Quaint, yes?

Lastly, the gold metallic foil "510 Weirdy" 1 1/2" badge will show all your pals how 'legit' you are. Or at least how 'nuggit'.

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Kick A Capitalist" - T-Shirt
description: This shirt cries out, "Squares beware! Don't get caught slippin', Mr. Moneybags!!" That's a lot for a shirt to say, huh?! Available in assorted sizes! More sizes back in stock soon!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola Silkscreened "Meat Mess" Large Back Patch
description: Drawn by artist Christopher Murdoch (http://hambrawl.com), this awesome design is perfect for the back of any tough guy or girl's denim jacket, punk or not! So fuggin' rad! Take a look at the gruesome and cartoonish detail!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola 1" Pinback Buttons
description:
Made by our pals at Cleveland's Junky's Junk Shop & Button Haul (https://www.facebook.com/junkys.junkshop), these one inch round badges are a great way to wear something weird!

Choose from the following, starting at 12 o'clock and ending with the lil' goat from the cover of our 2010 LP, "F", in the middle! 

Add any buttons to the cart, one at a time, if you would like to purchase a few different ones!

#1 - "Cartoon Logo" 1" Button by Jason Chandler
#2 - "Barbarian Warriors" 1" Button by Don Reniff
#3 - "Freaky Baby Logo" 1" Button by Janelle Hessig
#4 - "You Don't Have To Die Alone/Twin Towers" 1" Button by Beckett Warren
#5 - "Sick Jagger" 1" Button  by Jason Chandler
#6 - "F Goat" 1" Button by Corbett Redford I

options.name: "You Don't Have To Die Alone/Twin Towers" 1" Button

name: Bobby Joe Ebola 1 1/2" Pinback Buttons
description:
Made by our pal Jen at Sykotic Buttons, these two badges are both based on very old designs for the band. The "Duo" button was draw by Vonny Bon Bons of Fleshies and the "Whitey & You" button was taken from an etching on a truck stop bathroom wall. Classy!

#1 - "Duo" 1 1/2" Button
#2 - "Whitey & You" 1 1/2" Button

If you want to order both, add one to your cart, change your selection, then add the next one!

name: S.P.A.M. Records Archive Grab Bag Bundle
description: Recently, the band found a trove of old S.P.A.M. Records (old home of the MacNuggits) merchandise literally buried in a basement in the Eastest of Bays. We assembled random "grab bags" each containing literature, fun items like cards, stickers or patches and 3 different CDs!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Space Epic/Garbage Pail" Button Set
description: Features three large 2" buttons! You get the amazing full-color "Space Epic" shield button and two other original "Garbabe Pail Dudes In Space" buttons featuring Dan as a many tentacled alien and Corb as a farting, drunken astronaut! Sweet!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola Silkscreened "Don't Give A Damn" Small Patch
description: Another design by the amazing Christopher Murdoch, this one shows a beach bum doggie with a certain flare for dissent. Keep it surly, America! Come in many different colors. Please take a look at the photo and ask for the colors you'd prefer in order of preference. No guarantees!

name: Bobby Joe Ebola "Official 510 Weirdy" Glow Wristband
description: Stand out at dark semi-crowded show as a proud social leper! This glow-in-the-dark wristband comes in neon blue or neon green and has images of bikes and guitar next to the words, "Official Bobby Joe Ebola 510 Weirdy"! Get weird!
